summary: The life and work of the enigmatic folk rock singer-songwriter.
cast: Gerry Beckley|Lee Blackman|Perry Botkin Jr.|Ray Cooper|Micky Dolenz|Stanley Dorfman|Terry Gilliam|Bruce Grakal|Doug Hoefer|Dustin Hoffman|Mark Hudson|Danny Hutton|Eric Idle|Rick Jarrard|Al Kooper|Trevor Lawrence|John Lennon|Randy Newman|Annie Nilsson|Beau Nilsson|Diane Nilsson|Harry Nilsson|Olivia Nilsson|Una Nilsson|Zach Nilsson|Zak Nilsson|Yoko Ono|May Pang|Van Dyke Parks|Richard Perry|Dick Smothers|Tom Smothers|Ringo Starr|Joan Taylor|Jon Voight|Jimmy Webb|Paul Williams|Robin Williams|Fred Wolf
keywords: self destructiveness|reference to franz schubert|cousin cousin relationship|embezzlement|loss of friend
title: Who Is Harry Nilsson (And Why Is Everybody Talkin' About Him?)
